website_summaries.verdict: A popular go-to spray that keeps makeup looking fresh and vibrant.
pros: Weightless spray keeps makeup looking fresh for up to 16 hours
Lowers the temperature of makeup so it doesn’t run
Works well over many hours and in humid conditions
A must-have for bridal and prom parties, or weekends in Vegas
cons: Too greasy for those with oily skin

customer_reviews.title: I only wear makeup when I go out on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I only wear makeup when I go out on the weekend. This works perfectly so I don't have to keep checking and reapplying makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: #1 Setting Spray
customer_reviews.text: This product IS LIFE. I’m a huge fan of all things Urban Decay but this Setting Spray is out here saving lives! I work very long hours but my makeup looks UNTOUCHED until I wash my face in the PM. Will always recommend All Nighter!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: But this works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Hard Candy setting spray to try and it melted my make up off. I was furious. But this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sewcute

customer_reviews.title: Make-up stays on better.
customer_reviews.text: It holds make-up for most of the day. It sets it.
customer_reviews.author: L Bryan

customer_reviews.title: but I still like to use it
customer_reviews.text: Not totally sure it works, but I still like to use it. I think it works.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Pettin

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product to make your make up stay on for at least two days. I don’t have to touch up my make up it’s just stays on and makes it look fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite beauty product!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this stuff. I use it everyday! My makeup lasts for hours and always looks good. This is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jean

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my daughter. I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. I don't know anything about it other than the fact that she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: James E Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled smell
customer_reviews.text: This spray showed up and I believe it is spoiled. It has a very off smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly does keep your makeup fresh and SET all day long, particularly your eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This product is magic. All day dance competition wearing heavy ballroom makeup and I had ZERO smudging, ZERO raccooning, despite sweating. I needed only to blot my nose and forehead for excess oil once during the day, which didn't seem to disturb the set of my makeup at all. Excellent, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: coffeehound

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not look like the item. Also the spray does not work as advertised, and sold at 50% markup from other places. Very difficult communicating with the person that sold it.
customer_reviews.author: Aminatta

customer_reviews.title: Keeps make up in place FOR HOURS & HOURS & HOURS
customer_reviews.text: This setting spray is the best. Not too perfumey, keeps make up in place in humid summer weather for hours and hours and hours and hours
customer_reviews.author: Megan V. Dow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was actually for my daughter, (age 20), who is an esthetician. She loves this product and won't do her make up without it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: It works great and keeps my makeup in place all
customer_reviews.text: I use this BEFORE applying my makeup. It works great and keeps my makeup in place all day
customer_reviews.author: Mary K All

customer_reviews.title: Spray this over your makeup. Sleep in it, ...
customer_reviews.text: Spray this over your makeup. Sleep in it, swim in it, die in it. Get buried in a shallow grave. Get dug up 40 years later. Your makeup will still be flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E Libby

customer_reviews.title: Kept my makeup on all day!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! I was maid of honor at my best friend’s wedding and that meant a 12 plus hour day. I bought this on a whim so I’d look half way decent in photos during the sticky June heat, and it kept my makeup on perfectly! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Makeup stays on nice! Also, defines features. Leaves a nice glow!
customer_reviews.author: Sally G

customer_reviews.title: That price is cray!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. If I use it frequently, I do start to break the out though. Yes ur face feel a little coated but I would still buy it for those special days that I am unable to touch up. Do yourself a favor though and don’t buy it from this seller. It’s $20 cheaper from competitors.
customer_reviews.author: New York Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Puts the "H" In HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spray at Macy's and it was so horrible that I feel compelled to warn others. First, the scent is an ODOR that smells wretchedly foul. Second, it left an unattractive visible film on my skin and finally, it did a lousy job of setting my makeup. I'm now sticking to what works for me and that's tarte's "Ready.Set.Radiant." makeup setting spray. It works. It has a beautiful scent. It makes my skin glow. I buy it directly from the tarte website, where it's often on sale, and also at Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Persephone

product_meta.title: Urban Decay All Nighter Make Up Setting Spray 4 Ounce Full Size
product_meta.description: Stop make up from melting with this All nighter make up setting spray . Amazing ingredients will hold your make up for 16 hours. perfect for all skin type . With temperature control and prevent smudging , creasing , melting for a long last and fresh wear .
feature_bullets: Makeup setting spray that hold your make up all night long .
